Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class TableWindow

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.GameWindow
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.TableWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TableWindow
extends GameWindow
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
It is the window where the match is actually played.

  • Method Details

    • mouseClicking

      public void mouseClicking​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      It saves on clientChoices the events requested by the player clicking with the mouse on a space. It generates a graphical effect too.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - generated by clicking on spaces on the game table.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • placeWorkers

      public void placeWorkers()
      It is called at the beginning of the game. It let the player choose where to place his/her workers.
